content.body: It is excellent to hear that Alex Russell is so supportive. I think we should learn more about his thoughts here, eg in an email thread or we could invite him to one of our regular meetings. OTOH I don’t think we should add syntax; I am curious why he suggested it.
The ideal case is that we can motivate Edge people to work with us on implementing AsyncContext
Alex can probably leverage a lot of resources on the edge side. Maybe also for devtools and html expertise
content.formatted_body: Alex can probably leverage a lot of resources on the edge side. Maybe also for devtools and html expertise

content.body: I do think the Q&A demonstrated some continued gaps in people understanding what the proposal was for. “Local storage” continues to throw web people off, for example. I don’t know if there is a general fix here, maybe just repetition
